= Prerequisite Software =
To install the toolkit locally on your machine you will need the following software.
* Java Development Kit, the software was tested with jdk1.6.0_05.
* [http://tomcat.apache.org/ Tomcat Apache] used as a container for the Data Access Web Application, the toolkit was tested with Tomcat 6.0. In the following we refer to the directory in which Tomcat is deployed by TOMCAT_HOME.
* The [http://exist.sourceforge.net/ eXist database system] for storing captured experiments, the toolkit was tested with eXist 1.2.0.
* The [http://sourceforge.net/projects/pedro PEDRo data capture tool]. In the following we use PEDRo_HOME to refer to the directory in which PEDRo is deployed.
